name: DelphicOracle
0:
”Alexa tell Delphic Oracle to give me a recommendation based on Arctic Monkeys”
”Recommend me something if I like the movie Birdman”
”Recommend me something based on the show Gotham”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: delphic oracle
des:
Finding the right movie, book or an album can be a tedious task that usually takes more time than it should. With Delphic Oracle this no longer poses a problem.

Just specify your favourite movie, band, TV-show, author or a game and enjoy up to 10 of your very own list of recommendations.

You can either ask for some recommendations based on one of the following:
- Movies,
- TV-shows,
- Books,
- Authors,
- Bands,
- Games.

The skill is powered, yet not in any way endorsed by TasteDive API.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
